001package com.github.sormuras.bach.workflow;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleFinderSupport;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectSpace;
008import java.lang.module.ModuleFinder;
009import java.nio.file.Path;
010import java.util.ArrayList;
011
012public class RunAllTestsWorkflow extends AbstractSpaceWorkflow {
013
014  public RunAllTestsWorkflow(Bach bach, Project project, ProjectSpace space) {
015    super(bach, project, space);
016  }
017
018  protected ModuleFinder computeRuntimeModuleFinder() {
019    var paths = new ArrayList<Path>();
020    paths.add(computeOutputDirectoryForModules(space));
021    paths.addAll(computeModulePathsOption().values());
022    return ModuleFinder.of(paths.toArray(Path[]::new));
023  }
024
025  @Override
026  public void run() {
027    bach.logCaption("Run all tests in %s space".formatted(space.name()));
028    var moduleFinder = computeRuntimeModuleFinder();
029    for (var module : space.modules()) {
030      var name = module.name();
031      if (ModuleFinderSupport.findMainClass(moduleFinder, name).isPresent()) {
032        new RunModuleWorkflow(bach, project, space, Command.of(name)).run();
033      }
034      //      var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(moduleFinder, true, name);
035      //      runTool(toolFinder, "test", Composer.identity(), bach().printer()::print);
036      //      if (toolFinder.find("junit").isPresent()) runJUnit(toolFinder, name);
037    }
038  }
039}
